name: Time Passing Simulator 2020
description:
This is a game about time passing and you running away from your problems. Just hold right, and occasionally tap down.

For example, one of my problems is adding music to my games so I ran away from it and didn't add any. Please feel free to imagine your own music, then hum that music down the phone at me in an attempt to make me change my ways.

This was built for the 2 Button Jam and is my attempt at playing with an alternative 2 button narrative. Talking about your thighs wan't necessary to do that, but it did feel right.

Art from the very talented Sam Vieten - https://s4m-ur4i.itch.io/
